summary: Ajami is the religiously mixed community of Muslims and Christians in Tel Aviv. These are five stories about the everyday life in Ajami.
cast: Fouad Habash|Nisrin Siksik|Elias Saba|Youssef Sahwani|Abu George Shibli|Ibrahim Frege|Scandar Copti|Shahir Kabaha|Hilal Kaboub|Ranin Karim|Eran Naim|Sigal Harel|Tamar Yerushalmi|Moshe Yerushalmi|Ghassan Ashkar|Tony Copti
title: Ajami
